verse: “Power and fear belong to God. He keeps peace in His high places.
Is there any number to His armies? Upon whom does His light not shine?
How then can a man be right and good before God? How can he who is born of woman be clean?
See, even the moon is not bright and the stars are not pure in His eyes.
How much less man, who is a bug, and the son of man, who is a worm!”
